category.name: Full Text Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_fts_use_asso_search
preference.preference_description: Activates the Full Text Search (FTS) searches metadata against associated objects or not. Valid Values: * false: The Full Text Search (FTS) engine will search metadata against main objects. This is default value. * true: The Full Text Search (FTS) engine will search metadata against associated object.
